passive.name: Boundless Thought
passive.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After using an attack, for each enemy target hit, additionally increases ATK by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. This effect can stack up to 5 times and last until the next attack. If there are {{3}} or more enemy targets hit, this unit's SPD increases by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).
